class.name: SpinePathConstraint
class.brief_description: Stores the current pose for a path constraint.
class.description: Stores the current pose for a path constraint. A path constraint adjusts the rotation, translation, and scale of the constrained bones so they follow a {@link PathAttachment}. See [url]http://esotericsoftware.com/spine-path-constraints[/url] in the Spine User Guide.

method.name: get_bones
method.description: The bones that will be modified by this path constraint. Modifying the array has no effect.

method.name: get_data
method.description: The path constraint's setup pose data.

method.name: get_mix_rotate
method.description: A percentage (0-1) that controls the mix between the constrained and unconstrained rotation.

method.name: get_mix_x
method.description: A percentage (0-1) that controls the mix between the constrained and unconstrained translation X.

method.name: get_mix_y
method.description: A percentage (0-1) that controls the mix between the constrained and unconstrained translation Y.

method.name: get_target
method.description: The slot whose path attachment will be used to constrained the bones.
